segments.text: I've been thinking about getting my hair cut .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I thought you were going to let it grow out long .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I said that , didn't I ? But I just don't know what to do with it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're in one of those in-between stages , aren't you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it's not short enough to be wash-and-go and not long enough to do anything fancy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you thought about wearing a hat ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it's one way to get through the in-betweens if you really want to grow it out !
segments.speaker: S2
